backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing products, orders, inquiries, and user profiles with admin/user authorization and CRUD-style product queries.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin and theming features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a full OKLCH variable color system for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground defaults.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML shell setting the site title and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry wiring TanStack Router, React Query, Internet Identity, and CartProvider with all application routes.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with localStorage persistence, item CRUD operations, and computed item counts.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items plus helpers for converting to backend order items and computing totals/counts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading, login prompts, or errors as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Displays a dialog with full order details including customer info, items, and formatted dates/prices.
Fetches and displays all orders in a table with loading, error, unauthorized states, and a details dialog per order.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductImp: UI panel for uploading a product file, parsing it, showing errors, and importing valid products via mutation.
frontend/src/components/app/AppInquiryPa: Inquiry form that submits user messages to the backend and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/app/AppProductLi: Displays product catalog using backend data or sample data with loading, error, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: App layout with top bar, content area, and bottom navigation controlling catalog, cart, and inquiry sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Handles login/logout with Internet Identity, shows principal info, and allows copying the principal.
frontend/src/components/catalog/SampleCa: Alert banner informing users they are viewing sample products and linking to the admin page.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, services list, contact info, and dynamic year/app identifier.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with logo, navigation, cart badge, admin button, auth control, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/sampleContent.ts: Exports store info plus sample products and services used as fallback content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Sets the document title on mount and restores the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, orders, inquiries, admin checks, and admin claiming using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with custom color variables, utilities, and admin UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with company story, values, and branding.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed views for orders and product import, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AppPage.tsx: Main app page managing catalog and inquiry sections within the app shell.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management, quantity updates, totals, and navigation to checkout or products.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form validation, order submission, cart clearing, and redirects when the cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and a form to submit inquiries, including success handling and validation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with hero content, feature highlights, and featured products sourced from backend or sample data.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPlacedPage.tsx: Displays order confirmation details and provides navigation to continue shopping or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductQuantityPage.t: Loads a product, allows selecting quantity, and supports adding to cart or buying immediately with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: React products listing page with search, filters, backend fallback to sample data, and cart integration.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of sample service offerings with icons and a section explaining service benefits.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint prices into INR currency using en-IN locale.
frontend/src/utils/parseProductImportFil: Parses CSV/XLSX product import files, mapping columns and validating rows into structured products and errors.
frontend/src/utils/principalFormat.ts: Extracts principal strings from identities and provides a safe truncation helper for display.
frontend/src/utils/safeParse.ts: Provides safe parsing utilities for BigInt and positive integers plus quantity validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the website project's state, including admin-access requirements, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests focused on fixing Live admin authorization. It outlines a single-admin model, backend admin APIs, and deployment stability needs.
